Bharrayegh class Fleet Escort (Military Starship)

The Bharrayegh class Fleet Escort is a typical Vargr multi-role corsair vessel. This class emphasizes speed and agility over armor protection, and has a wide mix of offensive weapons systems. The power plant is typically operated at 20% of full power, which provides full life support and 1-G of acceleration. Endurance at that setting is 30 days.
